name: remoteVideoStateChanged
description:
Occurs when the remote video state changes.
This callback does not work properly when the number of users (in the voice/video call channel) or hosts (in the live streaming channel) in the channel exceeds 17.

parameters.reason:
The reason for the remote video state
                              change, see VideoRemoteStateReason.

parameters.state:
The state of the remote video, see
                              VideoRemoteState.

parameters.elapsed: Time elapsed (ms) from the local user calling the joinChannel method until the SDK triggers this callback.
